title: Crunchy Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['450g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '225g margarine', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon milk', '80g porridge oats', '90g sugar-frosted corn flakes cereal, such as Frosties, crushed', '340g plain chocolate chips']
